main_tasks:
- Responsible for video Video/HDMI part to develop SEC project.

- Strong interpersonal relationship management with positive attitude and serving mind.

- Strong understanding of TV or display knowledge including HDMI part, system and development process.

- Experience in working with embedded systems, platforms and RTOS. Linux kernel experience is a plus

- Fluent verbal and written communication skills in Korean and English

- Highly motivated positive attitude with a strong drive for success and teamwork

- Ability to think creatively about problem solving issues.

jd:
Welcome to a world of opportunity!

MediaTek is always looking for talented people to work in our corporate offices around the world. We’re headquartered in Taiwan, but we also have sales and research subsidiaries in Mainland China, US, UK, Finland, Sweden, India, Japan, South Korea and Singapore.

We offer competitive salaries, a range of benefits and personalized programs for professional development.


주요업무
- Responsible for video Video/HDMI part to develop SEC project.

- Responsible for technical communication for Video related SPEC between Customer and MTK HQ

- Responsible for customer deliverables including SW package planning/quality with internal project teams.

- Responsible for customer support account for video issue debugging/solving.

- Responsible for maintaining good relationships between customer to get more useful information for further project.

자격요건
- BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Electrical Engineering

- Strong interpersonal relationship management with positive attitude and serving mind.

- Strong understanding of TV or display knowledge including HDMI part, system and development process.

- Experience in working with embedded systems, platforms and RTOS. Linux kernel experience is a plus

- Fluent verbal and written communication skills in Korean and English

- Highly motivated positive attitude with a strong drive for success and teamwork

- Capability to understand complex technical information and explain to audience with understandable manner.

- Ability to think creatively about problem solving issues.

- Ability to work in a team environment and to support other departments

혜택 및 복지
• 가족 경조사 지원 (배우자 포함)
• 패밀리데이 운영
• 결혼, 출산 선물 제공
• 종합병원 건강검진 제공 (연 1회)
• 교육비,통신비,동호회비, 여름휴가비 지원
• 명절, 생일 상품권 지급
